law.catch_line: It is a fraudulent insurance act for an insurer doing business in the State knowingly to write or pl...
law.text: It is a fraudulent insurance act for an insurer doing business in the State knowingly to write or place a policy or insurance contract in the State through, or pay a commission or other consideration to, a person that is required to have a certificate of qualification under this article but does not have a certificate of qualification.
